medical_history.chief_complaint: Inadequate weight gain leading to deferral of two-month vaccination.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of inadequate weight gain were noted since birth, with a feeding pattern that exhibited suboptimal intake. The mother expressed concerns regarding inadequate weight gain and abdominal distension; however, the baby had remained asymptomatic during the neonatal period with no development of jaundice.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Iron deficiency anemia during pregnancy, controlled with ferrous iron supplementation.
